categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a Republic Strategic Information Service listening post in the Syvris system was compromised, causing the Empire to attack the station while the SIS agents were evacuating. As a result, the Coruscant Aegis squadron were dispatched to ensure the agents' safe evacuation.
